title: Married or enter into a civil partnership after the date stated on the will
question: Did {deceasedName} get married or enter into a civil partnership after the will was signed?
questionWithCodicil: Did {deceasedName} get married or enter into a civil partnership after the latest codicil was signed?

required.summary: You haven’t answered the question about the person who died’s marital status
required.message: Answer ‘yes’ if the person who died entered into a civil partnership after the will was signed
